entry.title: Ethereum Closes In On Proof-of-Stake After Sepolia Testnet Merge The Sepolia testnet activated PoS consensus on Wednesday at block number 1,450,409.
entry.summary: Sepolia is the second of three testnets to merge their proof-of-work (PoW) execution layers with their PoS consensus layers before the upgrade can take effect on Ethereumâ€™s mainnet.
